```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("plotlyutils"))
```

```{r}
g <- ggplot(mpg, aes(class, hwy))
g <- g + geom_boxplot()
print(g)
ggplotly(g)
```

```{r}
plot_ly(mpg, x = ~class, y = ~hwy, type = "box")
```



```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
print(plotly_boxplot)
```

```{r}
plotly_boxplot(iris[, -5])
```
